short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome Extension gives you the power to play appropriate music when you browse Amazon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome Extension gives you the power to:
- play appropriate music when you browse Amazon
- bother yourself when you are not working

Instructions and source code:
https://github.com/Birch-san/chrome-buy-mode

Bundled with Elevator music from BenSound:
http://www.bensound.com/
http://www.bensound.com/licensing
